website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, attractive option with a bookcase headboard and under-bed storage.
pros: Made from solid pine, the superior construction includes five bookshelves at the head, six under-bed drawers, and a bonus cubbyhole at the foot for extra storage
cons: Though the drawers can be installed on either side for easy access to contents, the side without drawers will be exposed and will look best when pushed against a wall

website_summaries.verdict: A good transition bed for toddlers who need more space for sleep and storage.
pros: Twin-size bed with under-bed and headboard storage
6 drawers under the bed can be configured either way
No need for a box spring, it's ready for a mattress on top
cons: Will not work with a twin XL mattress
Backside of bed exposes the back end of the drawers

customer_reviews.title: This bed has no panel for the side opposite the drawers.
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NO PANEL FOR THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE BED. IT IS OPEN AND THE BACK OF THE DRAWERS ARE EXPOSED. The pictures do not show this side of the bed but they do indicate that the bed can be installed mid wall. Since there is no side panel it means the bed can ONLY be installed tight against a wall and not as shown in the attached picture (from Amazon's site). Can you imagine seeing through the back side of the bed to back of the drawers?!? This is absolutely unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Space saving. With one set of six drawers, the open side of the bed can be pushed against the wall or used for storage baskets/shoes/laundry...if it pushed against the wall, it can still be accessed by a door in the footboard and makes for a good hiding place. Also purchased the daybed style. Highly recommend. Assembly is easy for a beginner- just need help lifting some parts. But the bookcase and drawers are pre-assembled. My kids helped and we did two beds in two hours. Photo is with bunk mattress, otherwise mattress would be twice as high. The bookshelves are adjustable and include a hole for cords to trail out the back of the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: We LOVED this bed when we first got it
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this bed when we first got it. Unfortunately - after only having it for a little over 2 months the side wood rail broke - the wood split. Now if I had a toddler jumping on it that would be one thing but I have a teenager who lays on it while on his phone. Definitely not pleased to spend this amount of money and have it last 2 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: We were under the impression that this bed would be a very sturdy bed for my 10 year old son to grow with, however were mistaken. The wood is very lightweight and thin. We might get a couple of years out of it. If you are looking at this bed, you should save your money and buy some press wood bed from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jason  price

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this bed. The storage was exactly what I was looking for. The issue I have is that when it arrived the door at the foot of the bed was broken. I emailed the company and they had no way to replace just the door. After putting the whole bed together I was not about to go through the process of shipping the entire bed when I all I need was a replacement door. Overall very frustrating. I would not recommend Discovery World Furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Klein

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bed has amazing storage space and the kids love it. That said, one drawer was slightly mis-assembled and does not close completely. For the second bed, we had to return the entire drawer unit because it had black mold. The exchange was handled quickly, but 6 months later, we are still trying to get the company to acknowledge that the moldy drawer system was returned on the same truck that brought the replacement!
customer_reviews.author: cnash

customer_reviews.title: My Aspie will LOVE the hiding space
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! It is very well made. There is a secret door at the foot of the bed. The drawers only go 1/2 way under the bed. The secret door opens to the back of these drawers. My Aspie will LOVE the hiding space :-) it took my husband about two hours to complete. He said the only confusing part was the 'jam' near the secret door. I also purchased the cool gel mattress from AMAZON. Bed sheets from COSTCO.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: take a long time to come
customer_reviews.text: The item took a long time to come, that is the only concern. It is easy to install, only for some part, the hole was missing. You have to screw the nail in yourself.. Something to block the side door doesn't have too much function. I haven't figured that out yet. drawer doesn't have too much space. but you can hide a lot of things underneath the bed beyond them. The delivery driver Juan was nice.
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and convenient beds at a reasonable price. Solid, already partially assembled.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these in "honey". they look great. They come partially assembled (drawers and bookcase are already together) which was super helpful. The instructions for assembling the frame left a little to be desired, and as others have said - putting on the door was the hardest part. We put together both beds in about 5 hours. (We're in our mid 60's). We also took the advise of others and screwed down all of the slats. These beds are solid and sturdy. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wall

customer_reviews.title: end board is reversible some places you have to drill
customer_reviews.text: It was touch and go building literary building it because the draws and the door wasn’t specific about how to do it so it was trail and error . We finally finished it but the drawers still need some need work to put something in place that secures them ..soon next project since the diagram wasn’t to good ..
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Could use a toe kick
customer_reviews.text: The bed was pretty easy to put together though there were places the instructions could have been better. It's attractive but there are two things I would change. 1) It really needs a toe kick, like you see on kitchen cabinets. I'm constantly kicking it with my feet. 2) I would put a cutout in the middle of the rail around the platform so you can get your hands under the mattress. I got a twin size positioned against the wall. Between the bed's height and the difficulty in getting under the mattress, it is harder to change the sheets than it should be. Nevertheless, I'm not sorry I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: The Hobbit

customer_reviews.title: Parts broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and the first 2 where great went right together but the third one someone had hit with a fork lift and busted the headboard. Since these were a surprise for my 3 year old triplets I just put them together (luckily the damage was towards the wall). I would not recommend these beds for kids under the age of 10 because the drawers are cheap and when a kid uses them to crawl up they will break not only the tracking wheels but the floor of the drawer. They would be good for older kids though.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight flimsy Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broken after only 3 months. The main long support board just broke in half. So sad we wasted all that money on a flimsy bed. The wood is not very heavy. It's a lightweight wood that can break much easier than beds we used to have as kids.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived in the time frame promised and was very easy to assemble. The delivery crew even brought the boxes upstairs to where we needed to assemble. Assembly took about 1 1/2 hours and the bed is very well made and has very nice finish. Much better quality than a similar item we purchased from a local company. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: JS Homes Inc

customer_reviews.title: My one year review.....
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame does well. For the price, it is quite worth it. Very simple to assemble as well. This had taken me maybe 30 minutes to assemble. No visible damage either when shipped to my house. My son sleeps on it with no issues. Only reason why I removed one star is due to its flimsiness. My son does like to stand and jump on his bed. This has held up alright. If anything, I'd just recommend re-enforcing the attachment points on the frame to make it a little more sturdy. Someone recommended this earlier about this frame.
customer_reviews.author: HildenX

customer_reviews.title: Product headboard was received damage and Discovery was notified but ...
customer_reviews.text: Product headboard was received damage and Discovery was notified but to this day they have done nothing about replacing the part that was received damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed was easy to assemble, after I went online and downloaded the instructions as they were not included. The drawer assembly contain directions on how to attach it, but no instructions for the main bed. Only true complaint was since the bed is delivered via freight, everything I saw on the shipping stated to call and schedule delivery. Freight company just showed up without calling while we were not home to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D Daniels Sr

customer_reviews.title: I bought this beautiful looking bed for my 15 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful looking bed for my 15 year old, she loves it! I bought a 12" memory foam mattress but it's too high for this bed as it shows in the picture. You may also consider ordering another drawer set for the other side of the bed. Although the bed is 100% solid wood, I don't think it's sturdy enough for kids to jump and bounce!!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, I did add some glue to the wood to wood joints, the finish is lighter color than depicted in the internet photos. Seems solid enough for adult woman so far, I suspect mattress bouncing kids might be the death of it. Did what I wanted with minimal fuss.
customer_reviews.author: David Hineline

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT THIS TWICE,BY ACCIDENT,  THE TRUCK DRIVER IS BRINGING THE SECOND
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE That he was right on time ... I ordered it twice by accident... The Driver is bringing the second one back. I couldn't be more pleased... I'm a disabled Veteran and I really appreciate his help...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed but read my review.
customer_reviews.text: Well built bed and very easy to put together as well. The only thing I would suggest is making a support to place in the open side as that is a long span and will cause that board to fail over time. Outside of that, excellent bed.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Teets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 beds. The second bed had some broken pieces. I contacted the company who was more than willing to fix the issue. We love our daughters beds recommend AND would buy another one from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: 3 girls and 1 guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Our son's room is small and the measurements of the bed needed to be spot on for it to fit. Fortunately the measurements online were exactly the size of the bed and it fit perfectly. Bed was easy to assemble by one person and the boxes that it was delivered in were not overly difficult to move up a flight of stairs. The overall quality of the product is nice and my son loves his new 'big boy bed'.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking real wood bed.
customer_reviews.text: It only took about a half hour to assemble, probably because our son who is 4 wanted to help with his big boy bed. We have a bed similar to this that was my husband's as a child and our other son uses that. We hope to get many years out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bed.  Would recomend for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came in three boxes so easy to move prior to assembly. Got it for a 16 year old and the first thing she did was crawl into the storage area under the bed behind the drawers. She fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: DARCIE CONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price; mattress slats break easily!
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t made well, the boards that hold the mattress break very easily and you find yourself sleeping in a hole which really hurts your back! Plus, Amazon AND the company it came from BOTH CHARGED ME!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this bed! It has all the storage space she needs but she doesn't have to climb stairs every day and night to get into it. It was a little bit of a struggle to put together... NOT a one person job by any means... but nothing extreme. Shipped in easy to manage boxes and in a relatively good amount of time. All in all I and my daughter highly recommend this bed especially for smaller rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Juliano

customer_reviews.title: advertised at 585 but somehow ended up 750
customer_reviews.text: Update! We had the headboard frame on incorrectly. It works great and the recipient loves it! I still have issues how it went from 585 to 750, but I still like the bed.
customer_reviews.author: missB

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and was excited until it was delivered and found out it has missing parts. The manufacturer will not reimburse you or supply you with the missing parts. The retailer is responsible for this.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bed for my son. Easy to assemble. Uses real wood. Drawers already set to place under bed. Smooth surface. Lots of space in drawer. Lots of space under ber with opening option. Material is good quality wood. With excellent quality wood
customer_reviews.author: PSilves

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Efficient Use of Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these beds for my boys so they could share the room easier. With these beds we do not need a dresser so it saves storage space. They are sturdy and efficient. My boys also love to get under the bed in the open storage area and play. My older son even sleeps and/or reads under there sometimes with the door open for ventilation
customer_reviews.author: J Nalls

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Drawers were not as deep as I had hoped, but deep enough to work. Other than the door being a pain to put on, we love the bed. My son had to move to a smaller room and we used this as an incentive, and he is happy with it. It looks amazing and he looks so comfortable in it. He will need to be gentle with the drawers, but they do not stick at all. We are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old son, and he absolutely loves it! It has exceeded my expectations, the quality is great, it is very sturdy, and the storage is plenty. My son loves the little door at the foot of the bed for a hideout spot.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M Sharier Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for Small Space
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this purchase. It arrived in great condition. It was easy to assemble, is solid wood, and seems very sturdy. The company called us to schedule a delivery time that was convenient for us, and the delivery driver gave us an hour notice that he was on his way. My son loves his new bed, and it was a practical solution for his small bedroom, giving him extra floor space because we no longer need a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my mother. When it finally arrived it was easy to assemble and it's sturdy enough for a 230 lbs adult to sleep on comfortably. Andrew at Discovery World Furniture was very kind and helpful with the shipping and delivery complications. Despite the delivery complications I'm considering purchasing a second bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, son loves it
customer_reviews.text: There are a good number of slats, and they are bound together to reinforce the strength by dispersing weight. Son loves his new bed with the drawers, shelves, and “hiding space.” There is only one side on bottom (the drawers), so you’ll want it against a wall to create a hiding space, rather than an open space. Solid wood, easy to assemble, and overall made well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these sets for my kids' rooms. Easy enough to put together with just a power screwdriver. Good quality, and we love the bookcase headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Puncess

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly & VERY sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father to save space & add storage when he moved into a senior living efficiency apartment. Love it...and, more importantly...HE loves it. Very sturdy, easily assembled by one person, drawers move smoothly. Topped with a Tuft&Needle mattress. Comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bed. Easy to assemble and sturdy. My only complaint is that various pieces came chipped and damaged. On the bookcase headboard there is obvious damage that the manufacture tried to cover, but is easily seen. The defects are cosmetic and I could have repacked it and sent it back, but it seemed more work than it was worth for a visual defect.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Obertance

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price - attaching the door is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good deal, and the only reason I'm not giving it five stars is the door at the foot of the bed. It doesn't come pre-drilled, and was a bear to attach correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cogliostro

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! All wood and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! All wood and easy to put together! The only complaint would be the 2 small shelves you hang on the headboard part. If you bump into them at all with your pillow they do move. But not s huge complaint, you can remove them or move them how you would like.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Great Captain's bed frame. Easily to assemble. All of the tools provided. Loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as we thought but excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s real wood but it seems like very thin wood not as sturdy as we were thinking. There were a few chips on the wood as well. However the customer service was excellent the man who helped us sent us a touch up kit immediately. He also answered all of my questions very kindly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: All I can say this bed is 👏 AWESOME easy to put together would recommend to anyone just a beautiful piece of furniture 🤗💖💖💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: bis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: We are satisfied with the bed. Our son (7 yo) is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for my child. It is study, easy to assemble, and beautiful. When the bed was delivered there was a little shipping damage however the company was very quick to respond and send a replacement. Excellent customer service! Will definitely purchase from again!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fine for its purpose - lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine bed - but it is definitely a cheap bed. Installation was easy - delivery was as ordered. Since this is for a teenager, it won't get much use or abuse so it is fine - but this is definitely not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: LDL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Every thing was great and the instructions were easy to follow, only issue I had was that all of the holes were not pre drilled. So it took a lot of work for me to get the screws in. Other than that I’m satisfied with my purchase and my son loves his big boy bed!
customer_reviews.author: Rhalia

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this bed! It has drawers and a storage area underneath that they like to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Raellen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for space saving for my two boys who share a room, very sturdy and looks great set up!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed... drawers open and close very smoothly and provide plenty of space. The open area behind the drawers is also great. Very pleased with quality and assembly. Would definitely recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed that has 6 drawers and you can store bens behind the drawers and its all wood
customer_reviews.author: shopper plus

customer_reviews.title: Great! I really love this bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Great! I really love this bed frame... will get one in a queen if I can someday soon! easy to build and has good storage and an awesome little secret compartment I would have died for as a kid! :-)
customer_reviews.author: random dude

customer_reviews.title: Solid and very nice looking. It's a bit high for my son
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the cutest thing. Solid and very nice looking. It's a bit high for my son, so we got a 5 in mattress instead of a big one. I am only giving it 4 stars because it arrived damaged :( I contacted Amazon customer service and they were awesome about issuing a refund. So all and all, a great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  Labrie

customer_reviews.title: great bed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and EASY to put together. Practical under bed storage as well as the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Jilrene

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed. Lots of storage. Best part per my husband was that it came mostly assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dekoeyer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Storage good. Thought it would be a little bit more sturdy, but overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: good deals

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed about 2 weeks and so far we are still loving it ! Perfect for our 2 year old . I laid on it with him and it seems pretty sturdy. You can fit a good amount of small clothing in the draws underneath which makes it great for a small room ! It's absolutely beautiful .
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! It arrived early, even though Amazon still has no clue it arrived lol
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all the extra storage room in the head board and the drawers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed was easy to assemble and is actuall wood. My son loves his new bed. Has plenty of drawer space and storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Easy pezy putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble. Nice and sturdy. Wish draws were alitle deeper.
customer_reviews.author: donald araujo

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made bed! The drawers came already assembled which was an awesome perk. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the growing boy..
customer_reviews.text: The twins love them and gives them more room in their room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P Smith Sr

customer_reviews.title: A Very Pleased Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Ordering and shipping as promised. Very pleased with the quality, looks after assembled, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of box
customer_reviews.text: We received this product and it was damaged out of the box. There is a large dent in the wood. Would like the damaged piece replaced
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Amador

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is made of real pine wood and is very sturdy. I love all the storage! Best of all, my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: While unbox each item we found the bottom part ( ...
customer_reviews.text: While unbox each item we found the bottom part ( footbed) storage door part has deep crack anyway of just send this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: hipolito s.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a two year old
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed love the speed it got here and the conditions and unless your a complete idiot the instructions are easy to follow. Make sure you have a power screw driver will save you 15 mins of assembly which only took an hour
customer_reviews.author: Futurealistic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just because the picture is pretty. Don't have it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerLEO

customer_reviews.title: no pilot holes for the screws. jig bar too ...
customer_reviews.text: no pilot holes for the screws. jig bar too long-had to trim with coping saw. seems flimsy for the money. first/last world discovery product.
customer_reviews.author: vger72

customer_reviews.title: They love them- lots of space to store under the bed ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my pre teen kids. They love them- lots of space to store under the bed and the drawers are enough room they could go without dressers now they have more room for fun things in there rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kory  DeMey

customer_reviews.title: Bed looks amazing for the price and is well thought out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed looks amazing for the price and is well thought out in terms of construction. It is pretty sturdy as well as I sleep on it nightly and I'm 6'0 300 lbs. I would suggest this to anyone in need of a twin bed. I must say however that it wasn't quite as easily assembled as it was said to be. I would buy another should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality and unsatable
customer_reviews.text: The bed is too flimsy and unsafe. Very Poor Quality and not Sturdy. After fixing, the bed is very unstable And I'm very uncomfortable to put kids on this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pad

product_meta.title: Discovery World Furniture Bookcase Captains Bed with 6 Drawer Storage, Twin, Merlot
product_meta.description: Color:Merlot| Size:TwinThe Discovery World Furniture Staircase Bunk Bed with Twin Trundle provides plenty of storage space for clothing, toys, books and more! The stair unit provides the child with an easy and safe way to access the upper bed.
feature_bullets: The captains bed is constructed from solid pine
Bed includes the headboard which offers plenty of storage space for items such as alarm clocks and books
The six drawers are configurable on either side of the bed; They come fully assembled and slide directly under the bed
All Discovery World Furniture beds are tested and certified to meet the ASTM 1427-07 regulations set forth by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
Slat kit is included with the bunk bed making it mattress ready; No need to purchase a Bunkie board or box spring; Mattresses and bedding not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
